lines.text:
[looking at a picture of Lina Romay]
You know what? She's my girl. I wish I knew her.
Hello, Mr. Bull. Let's you and me fight.

[the bull draws facial hair on a picture of Lina Romay]
You know what? That makes me mad.
Ladies and gentlemen, the winner and new champeen, Señor Droopy from Guadalupe!
Now, Señor, you have won the bullfight. You can have anything you want.
Well... he he he... I want her.
But Señor, she would never go out with you.
[Cut to a live-action Lina Romay with Droopy on her knee]
Ladies and gentleman, I give you, the greatest bullfighter in all Mexico!
[the Wolf steps out into the bullring]

[unenthusiastic]
And the little shrimp challenger, Señor Droopy from Guadalupe.
